channel.title: Errors plz help me fix them
channel.description:
[code] inCombat(); //In combat ^ client.java:119: invalid method declaration; return type required staticAnimation(248, absX, absY, 100); //Animation ^ client.java:119: illegal start of type staticAnimation(248, absX, absY, 100); //Animation ^ client.java:120: invalid method declaration; return type required setAnimation(1058); //emote ^ client.java:120: illegal start of type setAnimation(1058); //emote ^ client.java:121: <identifier> expected actionTimer = 25; //Timer to reset animation ^ client.java:122: <identifier> expected teleportToX = absX; // not to move ^ client.java:123: <identifier> expected teleportToY = absY; //not to move xD ^ client.java:127: class, interface, or enum expected public void updateCharAppearance(int[] styles, int[] colors) { ^ client.java:128: class, interface, or enum expected for(int j = 0; j < 7; j++) { ^ client.java:128: class, interface, or enum expected for(int j = 0; j < 7; j++) { ^ client.java:131: class, interface, or enum expected pCHead = styles[0]; ^ client.java:132: class, interface, or enum expected pCBeard = styles[1]; ^ client.java:133: class, interface, or enum expected pCTorso = styles[2]; ^ client.java:134: class, interface, or enum expected pCArms = styles[3]; ^ client.java:135: class, interface, or enum expected pCHands = styles[4]; ^ client.java:136: class, interface, or enum expected pCLegs = styles[5]; ^ client.java:137: class, interface, or enum expected pCFeet = styles[6]; ^ client.java:138: class, interface, or enum expected } ^ client.java:140: class, interface, or enum expected for(int i = 0; i < 5; i++) { ^ client.java:140: class, interface, or enum expected for(int i = 0; i < 5; i++) { ^ client.java:142: class, interface, or enum expected } ^ client.java:145: class, interface, or enum expected public int distanceTo(Player other) { ^ client.java:147: class, interface, or enum expected } ^ client.java:148: class, interface, or enum expected public int distanceToPoint(int pointX,int pointY) { ^ client.java:150: class, interface, or enum expected } ^ client.java:152: class, interface, or enum expected public int getItemSlot(int itemID) ^ client.java:154: class, interface, or enum expected for (int slot=0; slot < playerItems.length; slot++) ^ client.java:154: class, interface, or enum expected for (int slot=0; slot < playerItems.length; slot++) ^ client.java:159: class, interface, or enum expected } ^ client.java:162: class, interface, or enum expected } ^ client.java:163: class, interface, or enum expected public void setconfig(int settingID, int value) { ^ client.java:165: class, interface, or enum expected outStream.writeWordBigEndian(settingID); ^ client.java:166: class, interface, or enum expected outStream.writeByte(value); ^ client.java:167: class, interface, or enum expected } ^ client.java:168: class, interface, or enum expected public void viewTo(int coordX, int coordY) { ^ client.java:170: class, interface, or enum expected viewToY = ((2 * coordY) + 1);
